wikis.title: Create a new 'HowTo'
wikis.description: Is something missing? This is how you make a new 'HowTo'.

wikis.title: Add another email to GMail
wikis.description:
This is how you add another email to your GMail. 
 Very useful for people in committees.

wikis.title: Book a group room
wikis.description: This is how you book a group room at Chalmers. Useful when you need to work on a group project or just need some quiet time.
